capabilities.name: printEnv
capabilities.description: Prints all environment variables, helpful for debugging MCP server configuration

capabilities.name: longRunningOperation
capabilities.description: Demonstrates a long running operation with progress updates

capabilities.name: sampleLLM
capabilities.description: Samples from an LLM using MCP's sampling feature

capabilities.name: annotatedMessage
capabilities.description: Demonstrates how annotations can be used to provide metadata about content

capabilities.name: getResourceReference
capabilities.description: Returns a resource reference that can be used by MCP clients
